sourcesContent:
<template>
	<v-chart :option="option" style="height: 300px" />
</template>

<script setup>
	import { ref } from "vue";
	import VChart from "vue-echarts";

	const option = ref({
		title: { text: "人均 GDP 对比（美元）", left: "center" },
		tooltip: {},
		xAxis: { type: "category", data: ["中国", "美国"] },
		yAxis: { type: "value" },
		series: [
			{
				name: "人均GDP",
				type: "bar",
				data: [13020, 87385],
				itemStyle: { color: "#91CC75" }
			}
		]
	});
</script>
